SELECT B.id, B.code, B.name, B.iap_dict_id iapDictId, B.key_value keyValue FROM iap_dict_t A LEFT JOIN iap_dict_item_t B ON B.iap_dict_id = A.id WHERE A.code = #{code}

SELECT id, code, title, name, sign, sys_notice_content AS content, create_name AS createName, create_time AS createTime, message_code AS messageCode, message_type_code AS messageTypeCode, msg_type_id AS msgTypeId, notice_enabled_flag AS noticeEnabledFlag, notice_type_code AS noticeTypeCode, service_module_code AS serviceModuleCode, template_type_code AS templateTypeCode, update_name AS updateName, update_time AS updateTime, pc_url AS pcUrl, (SELECT B.name FROM iap_dict_t A LEFT JOIN iap_dict_item_t B ON B.iap_dict_id = A.id WHERE A.code = #{serviceModule} AND key_value = service_module_code ) as serviceModuleName, (SELECT B.name FROM iap_dict_t A LEFT JOIN iap_dict_item_t B ON B.iap_dict_id = A.id WHERE A.code = #{noticeTypeCode} AND key_value = notice_type_code ) as noticeTypeName FROM msg_public_template WHERE id = #{id}
